meta_description: "Upgrade your bathroom with this modern 36in. vanity set. Features include a 7in. deep sink, 1 shelf, and soft close hinges. Includes cabinet hardware and a 1 year warranty. Assembly required."
meta_title: "36" Free Standing Single Basin Vanity Set with Cabinet and Quartz Vanity Top by Winnow"
details:
Timeless, simplistic pieces updated for the modern home, Winnow bathroom cabinets are at once familiar and different. Optional tall, tapered legs and symmetrical design are recognizably Shaker, while beveled door and drawer fronts and hardware with rounded corners deliver fresh details. The perfect balance of classic, elegant, and versatile, Winnow vanities come to life when you select your cabinet color. Cabinet, countertop, sink, legs, shelf, and hardware are included with the set, which is ready for self-assembly on legs or wall. Additional hardware finishes are available (sold separately).

Included Components:

  • Covered under Kohler's 1 year limited warranty
  • Solid wood and moisture-resistant MDF vanity cabinet with 2 doors, 1 drawer and 1 shelf
  • Quartz vanity top with 1 vitreous china sink
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately

Cabinet Features:

  • Constructed from solid wood and moisture-resistant MDF providing a lifetime of durability
  • Free standing installation â€“ vanity is seated on the floor with wall anchors, providing a functional design
  • Single door design provides easy access to storage space
  • 2 door design provides easy access to storage space
  • 1 full extension drawer with soft-close slides allows for organized storage
  • Soft close drawer slides operate on smooth ball-bearings and prevent drawers from slamming shut
  • Vanity cabinet includes matching decorative hardware
  • Vanity will ship fully assembled

Vanity Top Features:

  • Quartz vanity top with 1 Vitreous China sink
  • 3 pre-drilled faucet holes
  • Each sink features its own rectangular single basin work space
  • Center drain location provides optimal draining capability
  • Equipped with an overflow drain to help prevent water overflow and spillage from occurring

Cabinet Top Specifications:

  • Cabinet Width: 36" (from left to right)
  • Cabinet Height: 34-7/16" (from top to bottom)
  • Cabinet Depth: 18-1/16" (from front to back)
  • Number of Doors: 2
  • Number of Drawers: 1
  • Number of Shelves: 1

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 39-5/8" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 18-1/16" (front edge to back edge)
  • Number of Basins: 1
  • Sink Basin Measurements: 12" L x 12" W x 7" H
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 3
  • Faucet Centers: 8" (distance between the installation holes for the faucet handles)
